getProp.desc: Function to get a property node for the API entry.

openState.desc: The state object to manage open/close state of nodes.

masterKey.desc: The master key for the API entry.

prop.desc: The property object to generate the node for.

level.desc: The level of the property in the hierarchy.

returns.desc: An array of VNode elements representing the property.

getDiv.desc: Function to create a div element for the API entry.

cols.desc: The number of columns the div should span.

children.desc: The child nodes for the div.

returns.desc: A VNode element representing the div.

getStringType.desc: Function to get the string representation of a type.

type.desc: The type object to get the string representation for.

returns.desc: The string representation of the type.
